extendedInfo.description: The diamond standard in casual puzzle action is now free to play! Diamond Twister 2 brings all the gem-swapping, color-matching fun back with exciting gameplay mechanics, power-ups and depth!A BRILLIANT JOURNEY- Story mode will take you on an adventure across 8 exciting jet-set locations. - Meet dozens of intriguing characters.- Take on 120 engaging levels.ENGAGING CHALLENGES & POWERS- 10 unique gameplay mechanics constantly change up the action, such as mists that obscure the screen and obstacles that alter how the diamonds fall.- An arsenal of power-ups, like the Time Freeze, Twisters and Bombs, will help you clear stages in record time.UNLIMITED FUN FOR ALL- Endless mode lets you play freely and see just how long you can keep racking up the points.- Everyone can enjoy this game thanks to easy-to-use touch controls that will have you crashing gems like a pro.Let's Play by Gameloft----Visit our official site at www.gameloft.comFollow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/gameloft or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.Check out our videos and game trailers on www.youtube.com/gameloft. Discover our blog at http://blog.gameloft.com/ for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.Terms of use : http://www.gameloft.com/conditions/

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: I usually like all of Game lofts game but this one is hard to play, the ads are blocking the puzzles!!!  This wasn\'t smartest place to place the ads... So good concept but must uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Diamond twister 2
reviews.comment: I use to love the game. On this version .the ads pop up so There is no Way to play cause the Diamond os blocked By the Damm ad. Yes I am well aware It is a free game !
reviews.author: Kenneth Clay

reviews.title: Not impressed
reviews.comment: This isn\'t anything like Bejeweled twist. Plus ads take up whole bottom of game board. Plus what\'s with the lame story line? Uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap crap crap
reviews.comment: Your game sucks at the suckiest level of suckyness......what the hell with that inane noise that\'s sopposed to be music ...this game s ucky suck sucks
reviews.author: Ali Martin

reviews.title: Annoying ads
reviews.comment: The ads are placed on the bottom of the board where the very last bottom tier you cannot see the gems, which in turn u can not proceed to the next level
reviews.author: Lindsey Veal

reviews.title: Great potential
reviews.comment: Would be a great game if the ads didn\'t block the screen and make the game unplayable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ad ruins it!
reviews.comment: I cannot play certain things in the game because the ads are in the way. Very annoying and needs to be fixed. Until then i wont give higher than 1 star. Motorola Electrify.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrated
reviews.comment: Can\'t enjoy it...the ads keep getting in the way! This SUCKS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I just installed it & it\'s a pretty good game so far. I\'m not having any problems with ads blocking the game like some other people reviewed. My only problem so far is that the graphics for the jewels could be better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Partially unplayable
reviews.comment: Advertisement covers lowest row of gems. Move the advert below the playfield for a better review. There isn\'t even a paid version to remove the ads, they just mess the gameplay up with no recourse.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.comment: This is the worst game I have ever tried to play. The add is right in the middle of the screen. You can\'t even play. So dumb!
reviews.author: Kristl H

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: The ads get in the way, annoying. They sit perfectly on top of the bottow row...  >:/  If the developer can move the ad position then that could really help with the game play and make it more enjoyable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good game! But
reviews.comment: The adds are right in the middle of the frikking screen. I cant play cause there is a banner spread across the playing board and you cant get rid of it or get around it. Would love this game otherwise. Rlly stupid glitch.  -Fix it plz and i will love you!-
reviews.author: chelan mazereeuw

reviews.title: Diamond Twister 2 Free
reviews.comment: Enjoying being able to rest and play at the same time. Addicting........

reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Very good good good game. Good job Gameloft.

reviews.comment: The ad is right in the middle of the screen making it unplayable.
